mapper.insert: insert into farm_activity (activity_no, farm_no, title, content, avail_number, price, is_help) values (farm_activity_seq.nextval, #{farmNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{availNumber}, #{price}, #{isHelp})

insert into everyones_farm_file (file_no, post_no, board_no, origin_name, file_rename, save_path, is_thumbnail) values (ef_file_seq.nextval, farm_activity_seq.currval, 1, #{originName}, #{fileRename}, #{savePath}, #{isThumbnail})
insert into farm_activity_schedule (schedule_no, activity_no, time, content, etc) values (activity_schedule_seq.nextval, farm_activity_seq.currval, #{time}, #{content}, #{etc})
mapper.select: select * from everyones_farm_file where board_no = 1 and is_thumbnail = 1
select count(*) from farm_activity where is_help = #{isHelp}
select count(*) from farm_activity a, (select * from farm where farm_name LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%') f where a.farm_no = f.farm_no and is_help = #{isHelp}
